name: MSCRMSplitPluginAssebly
description: Splits the plugin assembly into multiple plugin assemblies
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: This task splits the plugin assembly into multiple plugin assemblies based on class files filtered by regex.

inputs.name: regexType
inputs.label: Regex Type used to get filter plugin file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regex Type used to get filter plugin file and regex will applied based on selection.

inputs.name: regex
inputs.label: Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression to get filter plugin file. e.g. .cs means all file name contains .cs
